designer.title: 室內燈光設計師
designer.content: Working intently with the business team, procurement team and lighting installation team.Providing interior lighting insights and solutions for interior designers.Managing delivery dates and inquiries in regard to lighting manufacturers.

dashboard.title: 企業戰情室
dashboard.summary: 戰情室網站透過異質數據整合、即時資料呈現，達成「資料可視化」，可協助企業隨時隨地掌握最新運作狀況，迅速反應，提升管理與生產效能。
dashboard.information: 前端元件開發,前端多國語系功能,前端資料串接功能

ocrWeb.title: 企業辨識網站
ocrWeb.summary: 建立網站實現自動擷取數位檔案之文字內容，自動判讀文件類別、辨識區塊文字意義，將辨識結果組合為結構化資料，節省人工作業時間。
ocrWeb.information: late 16th century (as a noun denoting a place where alms were distributed): from medieval Latin eleemosynarius, from late Latin eleemosyna alms,from Greek eleēmosunē compassion
